personal.name: Dinakar Reddy
personal.title: Full-stack Developer & AI Engineer
personal.bio:

I'm Dinu, a passionate Full-stack developer and AI engineer with experience across ML, Generative AI, and IoT. Infosys developer trainee, and active learner & projects builder with 25+ delivered automation projects. I love building end-to-end smart systems â€” from IoT devices to LLM-powered applications.

achievements: Secured 88% F1-score in ML model for book genre classification
Built 25+ automation projects reducing manual work by 60%
Ranked in top 10% in university coding contests
in leetcode (200+ problems solved, 5-star rating, contest rating 2000+)

experience.description: Selected from 60,000+ applicants for an advanced Java development program. Completed 8 modules covering Core Java, Object-Oriented Programming, Data Structures & Algorithms, Multithreading, JDBC, Spring Framework, RESTful APIs, and Microservices. Built and deployed enterprise-grade applications simulating real-world business use cases. Gained hands-on experience with scalable architectures, debugging, and performance optimization in Java-based systems.

E-Commerce Platform - Designed and developed a full-stack MERN e-commerce application with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and secure checkout. Built a responsive React.js frontend with Redux for state management and dynamic product filtering. Implemented Node.js/Express APIs for product management, orders, and payments. Integrated MongoDB for product, user, and order data storage with optimized queries. Added JWT-based authentication and role-based access control for admin dashboards. Deployed application on AWS EC2 with Docker, ensuring scalability, monitoring, and auto-recovery.

Completed practical tasks in software engineering, including system architecture, application security, programming, testing, and Agile methodologies. Gained exposure to real-world engineering practices and collaborative workflows used at Accenture.

Completed practical tasks focused on coding and development, simulating real-world technology consulting scenarios. Enhanced problem-solving and coding efficiency while applying development best practices relevant to Deloitteâ€™s technology solutions.

certifications.name: Developing Back-End Apps with Node.js and Express.js

projects.title: AI-Powered Developer Portfolio
projects.description: Built customizable portfolio platform using Next.js, TypeScript, and Google Gemini API. Implemented AI-driven content generation and resume parsing for automated portfolio creation. Features include dynamic chatbot, responsive design, and Vercel deployment.

projects.title: Real-time Sudoku
projects.description: A real-time multiplayer Sudoku game built with React and Node.js, featuring user authentication, game rooms, mistake tracking, QR-based game sharing, and a live chat system.

projects.title: GPU System with Wave-Animation
projects.description: An interactive GPU particle system built with Three.js, featuring wave-based distortion and displacement controlled via shader uniforms. Includes real-time UI controls for particle effects and smooth WebGL rendering.

projects.title: Quick-Chat App
projects.description: A real-time language exchange platform that allows users to practice languages with native speakers. Features include video calls, live messaging, JWT authentication, and intelligent partner matching.

projects.title: SpamSense
projects.description: NLP-based spam detection tool that predicts whether marketing emails will land in inbox or spam folder. Features Streamlit web interface and scikit-learn ML model trained on real spam datasets for agencies to optimize campaign deliverability.

projects.title: Student Performance Prediction System
projects.description: A machine learning web application that predicts student performance using engagement metrics. Features include multiple model comparison, interactive data visualization, and real-time predictions with 71.5% accuracy.

projects.title: House of Errors
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform specializing in error-themed merchandise with secure checkout, inventory management, and an intuitive admin dashboard. Designed for a seamless shopping experience with responsive UI and robust backend.

projects.title: Chess Trace
projects.description: Built an IoT-enabled chessboard using ESP32, multiplexers, and 64 reed switches with 98.2% move detection accuracy at 1/8th the commercial cost. Features real-time move logging to Firebase, a web dashboard for live analysis and replay, and Stockfish-powered engine integration. Led a 3-member team through hardware prototyping, firmware development, cloud setup, and user testing with 20+ players.

internship.workStyle: Fast learner, team player, problem solver with hands-on experience in production systems
internship.goals: Join an innovative team building AI-powered solutions. I want to contribute to meaningful projects while growing my skills in enterprise-level development and scaling ML systems.
